title: Necrophagia.Through.Eyes.of.the.Dead.UNCUT.(WITH.EXTRAS).(2002).
description:
Directed by Jim Van Bebber, Necrophagia&#039;s music video collection lives up to the disturbing nature of all it&#039;s artists&#039; visions. The style of the videos are more like 70s and 80s shock exploitation, than of shitty MTV flash. The music is not death/black/hardcore/thrash, but a grating, discordant screech of feedback and snarls over a pummeling, sloppy rhythm; New Orleans sludgecore at some of it&#039;s finest. 

Saying they are better or worse than Cannibal Corpse or Mortician (that one made me laugh out loud) is moot. Its like going to see one the above mentioned bands, and then taking a wrong turn and ending up at a Texas Chainsaw family barbecue; this music is fuckin&#039; great and completely outside the box - FAR BETTER than either of the two bands mentioned above in my opinion. 

This video is the best collection of their work to date. Jim Van Bebber is an amazing horror director, hopefully he will never break out - for his own good that is. Download this; break into your friend&#039;s stash; buy some Jim Beam, and get sick on this film. 10/10

This torrent includes all the interview and rehearsal DVD extras.


BURN TESTED!

Enjoy and PLEASE SEED!

All files are XviD in 128 MP3 - the MediaInfo anaylisis below is for the main film only.
